General.Name: Shenzhen Zhongheng Huafa Co Ltd Class B
General.Description: Shenzhen Zhongheng Huafa Co., Ltd. produces and sells injection molded parts, light packaging materials, and LCD whole machines primarily in Central and South China, and Hong Kong. It is also involved in property leasing and management. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Huafa Electronics Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Zhongheng Huafa Co., Ltd. in September 2007. Shenzhen Zhongheng Huafa Co., Ltd. was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
